Summary: Java backend developer with approximately 4 years of experience building and maintaining RESTful applications using Spring Boot/MVC/Data/Security, Hibernate, and MySQL. Delivered security implementations, code reviews, and best practices within small agile teams; contributed to POS system development and API-centric projects. Comfortable with Docker, Maven, Git/Bitbucket, and unit testing frameworks like Mockito; looking to grow in cloud, CI/CD, and microservices ecosystems.
Strengths: Solid Java/Spring backend foundation with security and REST APIs
Hands-on experience with relational databases and ORM (MySQL/Hibernate)
Good collaboration in small agile teams with code review culture
Exposure to Docker and modern build tooling (Maven)
AreasToImprove: Add cloud and CI/CD tooling experience (e.g., AWS/Azure, pipelines)
Strengthen automated testing with JUnit, Testcontainers, coverage metrics
Gain experience with microservices patterns, messaging, and observability
Tips: Quantify impact (e.g., reduced response time by X%, improved reliability, decreased defects).
Add a Tech Stack per role including versions and tools (e.g., Spring Boot 2.x, JUnit5, OpenAPI, Docker).
Include CI/CD exposure (GitHub Actions/GitLab CI/Jenkins) and container orchestration (Kubernetes).
Document API practices (Swagger/OpenAPI) and security (OAuth2/JWT, Spring Security config).
Highlight any performance tuning (profiling, caching) and database migration practices (Liquibase flyway).
CleanedResumeText:
JAN-CLAUDIU CRISAN | Arad, Romania | crisan.janclaudiu@yahoo.com 
Nationality: Romanian | Date of Birth: 1997-05-28

TITLE
Java Backend Developer (Spring)

SUMMARY
Java developer with ~4 years of experience building RESTful applications using Spring Boot/MVC/Data/Security, Hibernate, and MySQL. Strong collaboration in agile teams, code reviews, and best practices. Interested in expanding skills in cloud, CI/CD, and microservices.

WORK EXPERIENCE
Java Developer — Nagarro | Arad, Romania | 2022-05-10 – 2023-06-15
• Built and maintained REST APIs using Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Data, and Spring Security.
• Implemented security solutions, conducted code reviews, and followed best practices.
• Used Liquibase, Maven, Docker, Git/Bitbucket, and Mockito.
• Collaborated with a team of 5 developers and a Product Owner.

Cash Register Sales and Developer — DEM SERVICE | Arad, Romania | 2019-03-03 – 2021-10-01
• Contributed to a full POS software solution and cash register programming.
• Implemented CRUD features and device–web interface communication; fixed bugs and improved quality.
• Participated in distribution and sales, developing relationship and negotiation skills.
• Stack: Java 8, Kotlin, Spring Boot, MySQL, Hibernate, Git.

EDUCATION AND TRAINING
Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering — Universitea "Aurel Vlaicu" Arad | 2018-10-10 – 2022-06-01 | EQF level 7

LANGUAGES
• Romanian: Native
• English: C1 (listening, reading, interaction, production, writing)

DIGITAL SKILLS
• Java, Spring (Boot, MVC, Data, Security)
• REST APIs, Hibernate, MySQL, Liquibase
• Maven, Docker, Git/Bitbucket, Mockito
• Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint); ECDL Modules 1–7
• Data Structures and Algorithms with Java
